kingdom.quote: Might comes with the path of nature.
kingdom.long_description: Spreading civilizations, exploited earth and chopped forests. The world needs a break. And so the elders has awoken once more to fight of the foes of nature and revert the balance.
kingdom.post_selection_description: , a conglomerate of dryads and oreads, has awoken.

engineer_description.description: With an elemental defender in your rows, you can use the ancient magic against your foes.

knight_description.description: Awake the fury in your soldiers and unleash the brute force of an earthquake upon your enemies.
